name: The temple (JamesBelock)
description:
One dungeon in one month. This is my final project for my video games development degree. Im glad to share this with you. I hope you enjoy it =)

---- Controls --------------------------

A, W, S, D --> Movement.

Left Shift --> Sprint.

Left control --> Stealth ON/OFF.

Space / Mouse 4 --> Dodge Roll.

LMB --> Attack.

---------------------------------------------

I didn't have time to program the options menu.

Known errors: In 144hz device stealth mode could present errors.
